2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: Behind Bars: America's Toughest Jail (TV Mini-Series 2012)

2.plot: After a hostile night locked up in Tent City, a notorious jail known as the "Alcatraz of Arizona," the British lads make first contact with the convicts who have made their lives a living hell, and the regime is too tough for some of them to handle. But worse is in store when they are taken to the secure unit - and join a real Chain Gang.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: Behind Bars: America's Toughest Jail (TV Mini-Series 2012)

6.plot: The British inmates are taken to meet Eddie "Chunky" Munoz, a gang member awaiting trial for murder. Will it be enough to scare them straight? The lads work at the animal cruelty shelter and discover that Sheriff Joe Arpaio treats his dogs better than his inmates.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: Behind Bars: America's Toughest Jail (TV Mini-Series 2012)

8.plot: After weeks of incarceration in Tent City, America's toughest jail, the Brits come to the end of their jail sentences and can almost taste freedom. But there's still one last surprise in store and James learns shocking news from home.

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: Behind Bars: America's Toughest Jail (TV Mini-Series 2012)

9.plot: The entirety of the series is condensed into a single episode leading to a follow up with the Brits.

imdb.title: Behind Bars: America's Toughest Jail
plot: In a unique experiment, a group of British men have signed up to become inmates in a real American prison -- their last chance to get back on the straight and narrow.
